# 情绪冲击

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/qingxu-chongji
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/qingxu-chongji
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install qingxu-chongji
qingxu-chongji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g qingxu-chongji
qingxu-chongji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
